Stable, House & Alter Upgrades
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Stable, House & Alter Upgrades
By Lisa Shock on Friday, October 6, 2000 - 07:52 pm:

These amounts are what the game charges you for the upgrades. You need to have significantly more money than this to be offered the upgrade. The game will not leave you with less than 5,000G.

First stable upgrade unlocks some monster types, second stable upgrade triggers the UFO visitation. The House upgrades add slots to your item inventory.

You do need to be on the Ranch on week 4 of May, for the event to take place. Make sure to have lost of cash and be present at least one week prior to the event to trigger it.

Stable
*PriceBreeder Rank
1st15,0004th
2nd30,0007th


House
*PriceBreeder Rank
1st5,0003rd
2nd8,0005th
3rd12,0006th
4th20,0008th


Alter
*PriceBreeder Rank
1st5,000not relevant
2nd8,000not relevant


Thanks to Kimochi!
